name: TXPORT_DATA_AUDIT
description: Contains audit data from the transport request.

columns.name: TRANSPORT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the request record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: AUDIT_USER_ID
columns.description: This item stores the user that changed data for this request.

columns.name: AUDIT_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: AUDIT_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: This item stores the instant that data was changed for this request.

columns.name: AUDIT_REQ_DATE
columns.description: This item stores the new date information.

columns.name: AUDIT_REQ_TM
columns.description: This item stores the new time information.

columns.name: AUDIT_USR_DEP_ID
columns.description: Stores the login department of the user that made the changes.
